languages.text: {n}Одернув одежду, Энрих подходит уверенным шагом.{/n} "Что ваши люди себе позволяют, Иокаста? Почему вы избиваете и морите жаждой моих людей словно преступников? Это простые рабочие, среди них подростки и старики — они ничего не сделали!"

{n}Einrich adjusts his clothes and approaches confidently.{/n} "What do your enforcers think they're doing, Jocasta? Why are you assaulting my people, denying them water like they're criminals? You've got teenagers and elderly folk here — they're all just ordinary workers, they've done nothing wrong!"
languages.original_text: {n}Одернув одежду, Энрих подходит уверенным шагом.{/n} "Что ваши люди себе позволяют, Иокаста? Почему вы избиваете и морите жаждой моих людей словно преступников? Это простые рабочие, среди них подростки и старики — они ничего не сделали!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Einrich adjusts his clothes and approaches confidently.{/n} "What do your enforcers think they're doing, Jocasta? Why are you assaulting my people, denying them water as if they were criminals? Those are common workers: they've got youths and elderly among them. They did nothing wrong!"

{n}Einrich adjusts his clothes and approaches confidently.{/n} "What do your enforcers think they're doing, Jocasta? Why are you assaulting my people, denying them water as if they were criminals? Those are common workers: they've got youths and elderly among them. They did nothing wrong!"

{n}Einrich adjusts his clothes and approaches confidently.{/n} "What do your enforcers think they're doing, Jocasta? Why are you assaulting my people, denying them water like they're criminals? You've got teenagers and elderly folk here — they're all just ordinary workers, they've done nothing wrong!"

{n}Infernus Master Einrich Monteg approaches at a confident pace.{/n} "What do your enforcers think they're doing, Jocasta? Why are you assaulting my people, denying them water as if they were criminals? Those are common workers: they've got teens and elderly among them. They did nothing wrong!"

{n}Einrich adjusts his clothes and approaches confidently.{/n} "What do your enforcers think they're doing, Jocasta? Why are you assaulting my people, denying them water like they're criminals? You've got teenagers and elderly folk here — they're all just ordinary workers, they've done nothing wrong!"

{n}Einrich adjusts his clothes and approaches confidently.{/n} "What do your enforcers think they're doing, Jocasta? Why are you assaulting my people, denying them water like they're criminals? You've got teenagers and elderly folk here — they're all just ordinary workers, they've done nothing wrong!"

{n}Einrich adjusts his clothes and approaches confidently.{/n} "What do your enforcers think they're doing, Jocasta? Why are you assaulting my people, denying them water like they're criminals? You've got teenagers and elderly folk here — they're all just ordinary workers, they've done nothing wrong!"

languages.text: {n}Einrich rajuste ses vêtements et approche d'une démarche assurée.{/n} « On peut savoir quelle mouche a piqué vos prévôts, Jocasta ? Pourquoi malmenez-vous les miens et les privez-vous d'eau comme s'ils étaient de vulgaires criminels ? Il y a parmi eux des jeunes et des personnes âgées. Autant d'honnêtes travailleurs qui n'ont rien fait de mal ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich adjusts his clothes and approaches confidently.{/n} "What do your enforcers think they're doing, Jocasta? Why are you assaulting my people, denying them water like they're criminals? You've got teenagers and elderly folk here — they're all just ordinary workers, they've done nothing wrong!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Einrich rajuste ses vêtements et approche d'une démarche assurée.{/n} « On peut savoir quelle mouche a piqué vos prévôts, Jocasta ? Pourquoi malmenez-vous les miens et les privez-vous d'eau comme s'ils étaient de vulgaires criminels ? Il y a parmi eux des jeunes et des personnes âgées. Autant d'honnêtes travailleurs qui n'ont rien fait de mal ! »

languages.text: {n}Einrich se ajusta la ropa y se acerca con paso confiado.{/n} «¿Qué están haciendo sus guardias, Jocasta? ¿Por qué asaltan a mi gente y les niegan agua como si fueran criminales? Aquí hay adolescentes y ancianos; son trabajadores normales. ¡No han hecho nada malo!».
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich adjusts his clothes and approaches confidently.{/n} "What do your enforcers think they're doing, Jocasta? Why are you assaulting my people, denying them water like they're criminals? You've got teenagers and elderly folk here — they're all just ordinary workers, they've done nothing wrong!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Einrich se ajusta la ropa y se acerca con paso confiado.{/n} «¿Qué están haciendo sus guardias, Jocasta? ¿Por qué asaltan a mi gente y les niegan agua como si fueran criminales? Aquí hay adolescentes y ancianos; son trabajadores normales. ¡No han hecho nada malo!».

languages.text: {n}艾因里奇整了整衣服，迈着自信的步伐走了过来。{/n}“你的手下到底在干什么，约卡斯塔？你为什么要折磨我的人，不准他们喝水，就好像他们是罪犯一样？这些人里面有年轻人，还有老人。他们不过是普通的工人而已，什么坏事都没做过！”
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich adjusts his clothes and approaches confidently.{/n} "What do your enforcers think they're doing, Jocasta? Why are you assaulting my people, denying them water like they're criminals? You've got teenagers and elderly folk here — they're all just ordinary workers, they've done nothing wrong!"

traits.locale_text: {n}艾因里奇整了整衣服，迈着自信的步伐走了过来。{/n}“你的手下到底在干什么，约卡斯塔？你为什么要折磨我的人，不准他们喝水，就好像他们是罪犯一样？这些人里面有年轻人，还有老人。他们不过是普通的工人而已，什么坏事都没做过！”

languages.text: {n}アインリッヒは服を直しつつ、自信たっぷりに近付く。{/n}「エンフォーサーたちは、一体何をしているつもりなんだ、ジョカスタ？なぜ私の仲間を襲い、犯罪者であるかのように水を飲ませないのだ？ここには未成年者や年老いた者たちもいるではないか。この者たちは普通の労働者だ。何も悪いことはしていない！」
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich adjusts his clothes and approaches confidently.{/n} "What do your enforcers think they're doing, Jocasta? Why are you assaulting my people, denying them water like they're criminals? You've got teenagers and elderly folk here — they're all just ordinary workers, they've done nothing wrong!"

traits.locale_text: {n}アインリッヒは服を直しつつ、自信たっぷりに近付く。{/n}「エンフォーサーたちは、一体何をしているつもりなんだ、ジョカスタ？なぜ私の仲間を襲い、犯罪者であるかのように水を飲ませないのだ？ここには未成年者や年老いた者たちもいるではないか。この者たちは普通の労働者だ。何も悪いことはしていない！」

languages.text: {n}Einrich zupft seine Kleidung zurecht und kommt selbstbewusst näher.{/n} "Wofür halten sich Eure Enforcer eigentlich, Jocasta? Warum attackiert Ihr meine Leute und verweigert ihnen Wasser, als wären sie Verbrecher? Ihr habt hier Jugendliche und Alte, allesamt ganz gewöhnliche Arbeiter, die sich nichts zu Schulden haben kommen lassen!"
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich adjusts his clothes and approaches confidently.{/n} "What do your enforcers think they're doing, Jocasta? Why are you assaulting my people, denying them water like they're criminals? You've got teenagers and elderly folk here — they're all just ordinary workers, they've done nothing wrong!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Einrich zupft seine Kleidung zurecht und kommt selbstbewusst näher.{/n} "Wofür halten sich Eure Enforcer eigentlich, Jocasta? Warum attackiert Ihr meine Leute und verweigert ihnen Wasser, als wären sie Verbrecher? Ihr habt hier Jugendliche und Alte, allesamt ganz gewöhnliche Arbeiter, die sich nichts zu Schulden haben kommen lassen!"

languages.text: {n}Einrich, kıyafetlerini düzelterek kendine güvenir bir şekilde yaklaşıyor.{/n} "İnfazcıların ne yaptıklarını sanıyor Jocasta? Neden halkıma saldırıp suçlu gibi onları sudan mahrum bırakıyorsunuz? Aramızda gençler ve yaşlılar da var. Hepsi sıradan işçiler. Yanlış bir şey yapmadılar!"
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich adjusts his clothes and approaches confidently.{/n} "What do your enforcers think they're doing, Jocasta? Why are you assaulting my people, denying them water like they're criminals? You've got teenagers and elderly folk here — they're all just ordinary workers, they've done nothing wrong!"
